subject: Re: About JunitReport
msgSnippet: ... Hi, j_cumps But in Junit, only failed assertions are recorded. I think Junitreport task can capture recorded assertions. However, I ve no idea about how to
messageBody:
--- In junit@yahoogroups.com, "j_cumps" <j_cumps@...> wrote:

> If you prefix your output in your tests with
> [testcaseclassname.testmethodname], you can cunningly forge an xls
> stylesheet that only takes output relevant for the current
> testmethod, and write the output to the type column.

Hi, j_cumps

But in Junit, only failed assertions are recorded.

I think Junitreport task can capture recorded assertions. However, I've
no idea about how to make Junitreport to capture successful assertions'
information which is i want to display.

If you can give me an example about capture successful assertions and
display at type column, that's very nice of you.

Thank you so much.
